title: 24: OBITCH an emotional rollercoaster...
description:
Happy Thanksgiving Geoffs! This week’s episode is quite a ride, we chat about death with dignity and then get into various contraptions like the euthanasia rollercoaster. We’ve got a silly obituary, a tragic one, and of course we’ve got some dumb.ass.criminalllllls let’s go! 
Follow us: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write us: obitpod@gmail.com
Sponsors: 
BetterHelp: Visit BetterHelp.com/obit for 10% off your first month! 
Sources: 
https://www.kezi.com/content/news/Man-arrested-after-starting-fire-among-4-U-Haul-trucks-569392381.html https://deathwithdignity.org/learn/death-with-dignity-acts/#:~:text=Death%20with%20dignity%20laws%2C%20also%20known%20as%20physician-assisted,how%20much%20pain%20and%20suffering%20they%20should%20endure https://deathwithdignity.org/learn/death-with-dignity-california-history/ http://howtodieinoregon.com https://deathwithdignity.org/learn/faqs/ https://deathwithdignity.org/learn/death-with-dignity-acts/ https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/yourdailyjournal/name/richard-bacon-obituary?id=8285958 https://www.bangboxonline.com/2021/03/23/25-dumbest-criminals-and-how-they-got-caught/ https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/nation/2014/01/05/lobotomy-patient-twice-wronged-while-in-state-care/4319493/ https://www.seeker.com/suicide-by-roller-coaster-1765430424.html https://science.howstuffworks.com/science-vs-myth/everyday-myths/question633.htm https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Euthanasia_device https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/real-rollercoaster-death-euthanasia-coaster https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Euthanasia_Coaster
